definition: The word "jahrelang" refers to a period of time that extends over several years. It is commonly used to describe a continuous or prolonged duration of an activity, event, or state that has occurred or will occur for a significant number of years.

examples.german: Er hat jahrelang in Deutschland gelebt.
examples.english: He lived in Germany for years.

examples.german: Sie hat jahrelang auf diesen Moment gewartet.
examples.english: She has been waiting for this moment for years.

examples.german: Er hat jahrelang f√ºr diese Firma gearbeitet.
examples.english: He worked for this company for years.

examples.german: Sie haben jahrelang an diesem Buch gearbeitet.
examples.english: They have been working on this book for years.
